amendment.description: Amendment requires the Secretary to establish a federally funded research and development center to be known as the Homeland Security Institute.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 107-615 to add a new section to the bill creating a Homeland Security Institute as a federally-funded research and development center.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Woolsey amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
